channel.title: Comments on: Death to Snow Patrol

item.title: By: Ace Athena
item.dc:creator: Ace Athena
item.description: Come on. Someone needs to supply the Grey's Anatomy type music. Check the post about Snow Patrol at <a href="http://www.rickredux.com/blog/2007/09/05/snow-patrol-finds-a-rick-4003/" rel="nofollow">RickRedux.com.</a>
item.content:encoded: Come on. Someone needs to supply the Grey’s Anatomy type music. Check the post about Snow Patrol at RickRedux.com.

item.title: By: bigcitysheep
item.dc:creator: bigcitysheep
item.description: I can forgive King's mention of "Chasing Cars" because of his praise for Josh Ritter, an extremely underrated singer-songwriter.
item.content:encoded: I can forgive King’s mention of “Chasing Cars” because of his praise for Josh Ritter, an extremely underrated singer-songwriter.
